TheVixenMod:Strike_TheVixen.NAME: Strike
TheVixenMod:Strike_TheVixen.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: Apply !M! thevixenmod:Burn.

TheVixenMod:HeatWave.NAME: Heat Wave
TheVixenMod:HeatWave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: Apply !M! thevixenmod:Burn.

TheVixenMod:Ember.NAME: Ember
TheVixenMod:Ember.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: Apply !M! thevixenmod:Burn.

TheVixenMod:FlameWheel.NAME: Flame Wheel
TheVixenMod:FlameWheel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !MISC! Block for each thevixenmod:Burn on the target. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: NL Repeat this effect once.
TheVixenMod:FlameWheel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Gain !MISC! Block for each thevixenmod:Burn on target !M! times. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: Repeat this effect once more.

TheVixenMod:Overheat.NAME: Overheat
TheVixenMod:Overheat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to yourself. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: Increase Weak applied by 1 and damage done by 8.

TheVixenMod:FlareBlitz.NAME: Flare Blitz
TheVixenMod:FlareBlitz.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to yourself. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: Increase damage dealt by 5.

TheVixenMod:Psybeam.NAME: Psybeam
TheVixenMod:Psybeam.DESCRIPTION: Target enemy deals NL !D! damage to itself. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: Gain Block equal to half the damage dealt.
TheVixenMod:Psybeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Target enemy deals NL !D! damage to itself. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: Gain Block equal to the damage dealt.

TheVixenMod:FireSpin.NAME: Fire Spin
TheVixenMod:FireSpin.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X*2 times. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: Increase X by 1.

TheVixenMod:FlameCharge.NAME: Flame Charge
TheVixenMod:FlameCharge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: Gain !M! Dexterity this turn.

TheVixenMod:MysticalFire.NAME: Mystical Fire
TheVixenMod:MysticalFire.DESCRIPTION: NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! thevixenmod:Burn. NL Gain !MISC! thevixenmod:Sunny_Day. NL Not thevixenmod:Sunny: NL Shuffle this card into your drawpile.
TheVixenMod:MysticalFire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL Apply !M! thevixenmod:Burn. NL Gain !MISC! thevixenmod:Sunny_Day. NL Not thevixenmod:Sunny: NL Put this card on top of your drawpile.

TheVixenMod:FireBlast.NAME: Fire Blast
TheVixenMod:FireBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to target enemy and !M! % less to the other enemies. NL Exhaust
TheVixenMod:FireBlast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to target enemy and !M! % less to the other enemies. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: Shuffle an unupgraded Fire Blast into your Discard Pile. NL Exhaust

TheVixenMod:Flamethrower.NAME: Flamethrower
TheVixenMod:Flamethrower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: Retain your rightmost attack, skill or power.
TheVixenMod:Flamethrower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Apply !M! thevixenmod:Burn. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: Retain your rightmost attack, skill or power.

TheVixenMod:Swagger.NAME: Swagger
TheVixenMod:Swagger.DESCRIPTION: Target enemy deals NL !D! damage to itself. NL Until the start of your turn, it gains !M! Strength and takes damage equal to half its damage dealt.

TheVixenMod:ConfuseRay.NAME: Confuse Ray
TheVixenMod:ConfuseRay.DESCRIPTION: Target enemy deals NL !D! damage to itself NL !M! times. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: Enemy takes damage equal to half its damage dealt next turn.

TheVixenMod:Psychic.NAME: Psychic
TheVixenMod:Psychic.DESCRIPTION: All enemies deal !D! damage to themselves. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: Gain Block equal to their combined thevixenmod:Burn and Strength.
TheVixenMod:Psychic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: All enemies deal !D! damage to themselves. NL Gain Block equal to their combined thevixenmod:Burn and Strength.

TheVixenMod:FlameBurst.NAME: Flame Burst
TheVixenMod:FlameBurst.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy isn't burned, apply !M! thevixenmod:Burn. NL Otherwise, gain 1 thevixenmod:Sunny_Day.

TheVixenMod:Facade.NAME: Facade
TheVixenMod:Facade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat this for every unique thevixenmod:debuff on you. NL ( !DBNUM! )
TheVixenMod:Facade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat this for every unique thevixenmod:debuff on you. NL ( !DBNUM! ) NL thevixenmod:Sunny: NL Unaffected by Weak.

TheVixenMod:Inferno.NAME: Inferno
TheVixenMod:Inferno.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to all enemies equal to the target's thevixenmod:Burn. NL Next turn, the target receives a thevixenmod:Burn equal to the thevixenmod:Burn it has now. NL Not thevixenmod:Sunny: Exhaust

TheVixenMod:LavaPlume.NAME: Lava Plume
TheVixenMod:LavaPlume.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times to a random enemy. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: Apply 2 thevixenmod:Burn to each target hit.

TheVixenMod:Hex.NAME: Hex
TheVixenMod:Hex.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to an enemy equal to the cumulative stacks of its debuffs (burn stacks only once), times the amount of unique debuffs on them.
TheVixenMod:Hex.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to an enemy equal to the cumulative stacks of its debuffs (burn stacks only once), times the amount of unique debuffs + 1 on them.

TheVixenMod:ShadowBall.NAME: Shadow Ball
TheVixenMod:ShadowBall.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL thevixenmod:Sunny or Weak enemy: NL Gain [E] and NL draw !M! card.
TheVixenMod:ShadowBall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL thevixenmod:Sunny or NL Weak enemy (stacks): NL Gain [E] and NL draw !M! card.

TheVixenMod:SolarBeam.NAME: Solar Beam
TheVixenMod:SolarBeam.DESCRIPTION: Consume all your thevixenmod:Sunny_Day. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies for each stack consumed ( !SUN! ).
TheVixenMod:SolarBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 thevixenmod:Sunny_Day, then consume all your thevixenmod:Sunny_Day. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies for each stack consumed ( !SUN! ).

TheVixenMod:Psyshock.NAME: Psyshock
TheVixenMod:Psyshock.DESCRIPTION: Target enemy deals !D! damage to itself X times. NL Gain X thevixenmod:Sunny_Day. NL Exhaust.
TheVixenMod:Psyshock.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Target enemy deals !D! damage to itself X+1 times. NL Gain X+1 thevixenmod:Sunny_Day. NL Exhaust.

TheVixenMod:FirePunch.NAME: Fire Punch
TheVixenMod:FirePunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! thevixenmod:Burn. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: Upgrade this card this combat.

TheVixenMod:TrumpCard.NAME: Trump Card
TheVixenMod:TrumpCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Unaffected by Weak. NL If you have a thevixenmod:debuff on you, the damage dealt is applied to all other enemies.
TheVixenMod:TrumpCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Weak is inverted for this card. NL If you have a thevixenmod:debuff on you, the damage dealt is applied to all other enemies.

TheVixenMod:Confusion.NAME: Confusion
TheVixenMod:Confusion.DESCRIPTION: Target enemy deals !D! damage to itself. NL Retain your rightmost attack, skill or power.
TheVixenMod:Confusion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Target enemy deals !D! damage to itself. NL Retain your rightmost attack, skill or power. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: Repeat this effect once.

TheVixenMod:Extrasensory.NAME: Extrasensory
TheVixenMod:Extrasensory.DESCRIPTION: Target enemy deals NL !D! damage to itself NL !M! times. NL thevixenmod:Sunny_Exhaust: NL !MISC! times instead.

TheVixenMod:FireFang.NAME: Fire Fang
TheVixenMod:FireFang.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !MISC! times. NL thevixenmod:Sunny_Exhaust: NL Apply !M! thevixenmod:Burn.

TheVixenMod:Spite.NAME: Spite
TheVixenMod:Spite.DESCRIPTION: Enemy takes damage and loses Strength this turn equal to the thevixenmod:cumulative_stacks of your thevixenmod:debuffs. NL ( !DBCD! )
TheVixenMod:Spite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enemy takes damage twice and loses Strength this turn equal to the thevixenmod:cumulative_stacks of your thevixenmod:debuffs. NL ( !DBCD! )

TheVixenMod:Defend_TheVixen.NAME: Defend
TheVixenMod:Defend_TheVixen.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: Draw a card.

TheVixenMod:SunnyDay.NAME: Sunny Day
TheVixenMod:SunnyDay.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thevixenmod:Sunny_Day. NL thevixenmod:Sunny and debuffed: Reduce the number on all numbered debuffs on you by !MISC!.
TheVixenMod:SunnyDay.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thevixenmod:Sunny_Day. NL thevixenmod:Sunny and debuffed: Gain [E] and NL reduce the number on all numbered debuffs on you by !MISC!.

TheVixenMod:PsychUp.NAME: Psych Up
TheVixenMod:PsychUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain Strength and Block equal to the Strength and Block of target enemy this turn. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: Draw !M! cards.
TheVixenMod:PsychUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Steal target enemy's Strength and Block until end of turn. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: Draw !M! cards.

TheVixenMod:MindReader.NAME: Mind Reader
TheVixenMod:MindReader.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block¹. If not, deal !D! damage². NL thevixenmod:Sunny: Inflict !M! Weak¹ or Vulnerable² respectively.

TheVixenMod:Magician.NAME: Magician
TheVixenMod:Magician.DESCRIPTION: Until end of turn, whenever YOU deal damage, draw a card, gain [E] and temporarily lose !M! Strength and Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

TheVixenMod:FirePledge.NAME: Fire Pledge
TheVixenMod:FirePledge.DESCRIPTION: Double an enemy's Burn, then gain Block equal to it. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: Triple it instead. NL Exhaust.
TheVixenMod:FirePledge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double an enemy's Burn, then gain Block equal to it.  NL thevixenmod:Sunny: Triple it instead.

TheVixenMod:LightScreen.NAME: Light Screen
TheVixenMod:LightScreen.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: Increase Block gained by this card by !M! this combat.

TheVixenMod:Protect.NAME: Protect
TheVixenMod:Protect.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 thevixenmod:Protectspam. NL Protect becomes !M! % less effective for each stack of thevixenmod:Protectspam.

TheVixenMod:WillOWisp.NAME: Will-O-Wisp
TheVixenMod:WillOWisp.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Burn. NL thevixenmod:Sunny (if possible): NL Apply it to all enemies. NL Exhaust.

TheVixenMod:CADC.NAME: Counter Attack Dash Cancel
TheVixenMod:CADC.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: Gain !M! Strength this turn.

TheVixenMod:Feint.NAME: Feint
TheVixenMod:Feint.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL thevixenmod:Sunny and Vulnerable: Remove up to !M! Vulnerable from yourself and apply as much Weak to all enemies.

TheVixenMod:Incinerate.NAME: Incinerate
TheVixenMod:Incinerate.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. Gain !MISC! thevixenmod:Sunny_Day and !M! Strength this turn.

TheVixenMod:Hypnosis.NAME: Hypnosis
TheVixenMod:Hypnosis.DESCRIPTION: Target enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: Gain [E]

TheVixenMod:NastyPlot.NAME: Nasty Plot
TheVixenMod:NastyPlot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain 1 thevixenmod:Sunny_Day. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: gain [E].

TheVixenMod:Refresh.NAME: Refresh
TheVixenMod:Refresh.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card for each unique thevixenmod:debuff on you NL ( !DBNUM! ) NL then reduce the number on all numbered debuffs on you by !MISC!.
TheVixenMod:Refresh.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card and gain NL !M! temporary HP for each unique thevixenmod:debuff on you ( !DBNUM! ), NL then reduce the number on all numbered debuffs on you by !MISC!.

TheVixenMod:WonderRoom.NAME: Wonder Room
TheVixenMod:WonderRoom.DESCRIPTION: All current temporary Strength and Dexterity changes become permanent. NL Exhaust.

TheVixenMod:Safeguard.NAME: Safeguard
TheVixenMod:Safeguard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! thevixenmod:Sunny_Day and !MISC! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

TheVixenMod:Endure.NAME: Endure
TheVixenMod:Endure.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: You cannot die this turn, exhaust this card if you would.
TheVixenMod:Endure.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL You cannot die this turn, exhaust this card if you would.

TheVixenMod:MagicCoat.NAME: Magic Coat
TheVixenMod:MagicCoat.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain up to !M! [E] for each unique thevixenmod:debuff on you ( !DBNUM! ). NL (5 extra Block for each thevixenmod:debuff above the limit)

TheVixenMod:Agility.NAME: Agility
TheVixenMod:Agility.DESCRIPTION: Retain your !M! rightmost attack, skill or power cards. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: Gain !B! Block.
TheVixenMod:Agility.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain your !M! rightmost attack, skill or power cards. NL Gain !B! Block.

TheVixenMod:ClearSky.NAME: Clear Sky
TheVixenMod:ClearSky.DESCRIPTION: thevixenmod:Sunny_Day is not consumed this turn. NL Exhaust.
TheVixenMod:ClearSky.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thevixenmod:Sunny_Day. NL thevixenmod:Sunny_Day is not consumed this turn. NL Exhaust.

TheVixenMod:Copycat.NAME: Copycat
TheVixenMod:Copycat.DESCRIPTION: Repeat the last card you played. NL Exhaust. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: NL Shuffle a copy of it into your discard pile.
TheVixenMod:Copycat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Repeat the last card you played. It costs 1. NL Exhaust. NL thevixenmod:Sunny: NL Shuffle a copy of it into your discard pile.

TheVixenMod:Barrier.NAME: Barrier
TheVixenMod:Barrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X times this turn and next turn. NL Apply !M! Frail to yourself.

TheVixenMod:PsychoShift.NAME: Psycho Shift
TheVixenMod:PsychoShift.DESCRIPTION: Absorb all Vulnerable and Weak from one enemy. NL Heal !M! HP for each thevixenmod:debuffstack on you. NL Exhaust.
TheVixenMod:PsychoShift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Copy all Vulnerable and Weak from one enemy. NL Heal !M! HP for each thevixenmod:debuffstack on you. NL Exhaust.

TheVixenMod:PerishSong.NAME: Perish Song
TheVixenMod:PerishSong.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to yourself and an enemy. NL Apply thevixenmod:Burn equal to the thevixenmod:cumulative_stacks of your thevixenmod:debuffs.

TheVixenMod:TrickRoom.NAME: Trick Room
TheVixenMod:TrickRoom.DESCRIPTION: For !M! turns, Vulnerable's effect on you is thevixenmod:inverted. NL Exhaust.
TheVixenMod:TrickRoom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: For !M! turns, Vulnerable's effect on you is thevixenmod:inverted. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable to yourself. NL Exhaust.

TheVixenMod:DoubleTeam.NAME: Double Team
TheVixenMod:DoubleTeam.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Unaffected by Frail. NL thevixenmod:Sunny (if possible): Gain 1 extra Block for each unique thevixenmod:debuff on you.
TheVixenMod:DoubleTeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Frail's effect is reverted for this card. NL thevixenmod:Sunny (if possible): Gain 1 extra Block for each unique thevixenmod:debuff on you.

TheVixenMod:BurnUp.NAME: Burn Up
TheVixenMod:BurnUp.DESCRIPTION: Consume all your thevixenmod:Sunny_Day. NL Draw a card and gain [E] for each stack ( !SUN! ). Exhaust.
TheVixenMod:BurnUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Consume all your thevixenmod:Sunny_Day. NL Draw a card and gain [E] for each stack ( !SUN! ), then gain !M! thevixenmod:Sunny_Day. Exhaust.

TheVixenMod:Curse.NAME: Curse
TheVixenMod:Curse.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable NL to yourself. NL Apply Poison equal to the thevixenmod:cumulative_stacks of your thevixenmod:debuffs.
TheVixenMod:Curse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable NL to yourself. NL Apply Poison to all enemies equal to the thevixenmod:cumulative_stacks of your thevixenmod:debuffs.

TheVixenMod:Disable.NAME: Disable
TheVixenMod:Disable.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !MISC! Strength this turn. NL thevixenmod:Sunny_Exhaust: NL Choose a card from your Exhaustpile and add it to your Hand.
TheVixenMod:Disable.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: All enemies lose !MISC! Strength this turn. NL thevixenmod:Sunny_Exhaust: NL Choose !M! cards from your Exhaustpile and add it to your Hand.

TheVixenMod:TailWhip.NAME: Tail Whip
TheVixenMod:TailWhip.DESCRIPTION: Apply !MISC! Vulnerable. NL thevixenmod:Sunny_Exhaust: NL Apply !M! thevixenmod:Burn. NL Gain [E]

TheVixenMod:Amnesia.NAME: Amnesia
TheVixenMod:Amnesia.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL thevixenmod:Sunny_Exhaust: NL Increase Block gained by !M! % and NL gain !B2! Block next turn.

TheVixenMod:FutureSight.NAME: Future Sight
TheVixenMod:FutureSight.DESCRIPTION: Play a card from your Drawpile. NL thevixenmod:Sunny_Exhaust: NL Play up to X cards from your Drawpile.
TheVixenMod:FutureSight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play a card from your Drawpile. NL thevixenmod:Sunny_Exhaust: NL Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile, then play up to X cards from it.

TheVixenMod:Wish.NAME: Wish
TheVixenMod:Wish.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next turn, heal for half the hp you lose this turn and gain temporary_HP equal to half the blocked damage you took plus half your surplus Block. NL Exhaust.
TheVixenMod:Wish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next turn, heal for half the hp you lose this turn and gain temporary_HP equal to half the blocked damage you took plus half your surplus Block. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

TheVixenMod:CalmMind.NAME: Calm Mind
TheVixenMod:CalmMind.DESCRIPTION: Draw !MISC! cards. NL thevixenmod:Sunny_Exhaust: NL Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity this turn.
TheVixenMod:CalmMind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !MISC! cards. NL Retain your rightmost attack, skill or power. NL thevixenmod:Sunny_Exhaust: NL Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity this turn.

TheVixenMod:SynergyBurst.NAME: Synergy Burst
TheVixenMod:SynergyBurst.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Shuffle a thevixenmod:Psycracker into your discard pile.
TheVixenMod:SynergyBurst.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Shuffle an upgraded thevixenmod:Psycracker into your discard pile.

TheVixenMod:Moody.NAME: Moody
TheVixenMod:Moody.DESCRIPTION: NCByYW5k b20gZ29vZCBlZmZ lY3RzIG FuZC Ay IGJhZCBvbmVz
TheVixenMod:Moody.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: NiByYW5k b20gZ29vZCBlZmZ lY3RzIG FuZC Az IGJhZCBvbmVz

TheVixenMod:Blaze.NAME: Blaze
TheVixenMod:Blaze.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL If you are at or below 50% Health, whenever you apply thevixenmod:Burn, apply !M! more thevixenmod:Burn.

TheVixenMod:Telepathy.NAME: Telepathy
TheVixenMod:Telepathy.DESCRIPTION: Enemies deal !M! more damage to themselves. NL Gain 1 Dexterity.

TheVixenMod:Substitute.NAME: Substitute
TheVixenMod:Substitute.DESCRIPTION: Take !SUB! damage. NL Gain !25%! thevixenmod:Substitute. NL Sunny: Gain 1 Artifact.

TheVixenMod:Guts.NAME: Guts
TheVixenMod:Guts.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thevixenmod:Guts. NL At the end of your turn, gain Block equal to the thevixenmod:cumulative_stacks of your thevixenmod:debuffs.

TheVixenMod:FlameBody.NAME: Flame Body
TheVixenMod:FlameBody.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked, apply !M! thevixenmod:Burn to the attacker next turn.

TheVixenMod:Dazzling.NAME: Dazzling
TheVixenMod:Dazzling.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card's thevixenmod:Sunny effect is triggered, gain !M! Block.
TheVixenMod:Dazzling.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card's thevixenmod:Sunny effect is triggered, gain !M! Block. NL Gain !MISC! thevixenmod:Sunny_Day.

TheVixenMod:Drought.NAME: Drought
TheVixenMod:Drought.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain thevixenmod:Sunny_Day, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

TheVixenMod:Analytic.NAME: Analytic
TheVixenMod:Analytic.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play !M! or less cards in a turn, gain 1 thevixenmod:Sunny_Day.

TheVixenMod:Psycracker.NAME: Psycracker
TheVixenMod:Psycracker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to NL a random enemy !M! times. NL Lose Synergy Burst's effects. NL Purge

TheVixenMod:UmbreonSnarl.NAME: Umbreon
TheVixenMod:UmbreonSnarl.DESCRIPTION: All enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust Retain

TheVixenMod:UmbreonFoulPlay.NAME: Umbreon
TheVixenMod:UmbreonFoulPlay.DESCRIPTION: Target enemy deals !D! damage to itself. NL Exhaust Retain

TheVixenMod:UmbreonRefresh.NAME: Umbreon
TheVixenMod:UmbreonRefresh.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust Retain

TheVixenMod:UmbreonHelpingHand.NAME: Umbreon
TheVixenMod:UmbreonHelpingHand.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of all cards in your hand by !M!. NL Exhaust Retain

TheVixenMod:BossBurn.NAME: Burn
TheVixenMod:BossBurn.DESCRIPTION: When drawn, NL draw a card. NL You take !M! more damage.
